name: Mushrooms Poached With Coriander And Lemon
keywords: dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, lemon juice, mushroom, side dish
recipeIngredient: 2 cloves garlic, peeled and thinly sliced
10 ounces small white mushrooms, cleaned and trimmed

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the water, lemon juice, olive oil, salt, peppercorns, coriander seeds and garlic in a medium saucepan and bring to a boil. Lower the heat and simmer for 10 minutes. Add the mushrooms and simmer for 10 minutes longer.
Set the mushrooms aside to cool in the liquid. Refrigerate overnight.
Just before serving, gently heat the mushrooms in the liquid. Remove with a slotted spoon, divide among 4 plates and sprinkle with the parsley.
